eof

TIMEOUT

public int TIMEOUT
When read() is called with no data available, throw an IOException. If set to 0 and read will just return 0 when no data is availabe.

public MundoInputStream(java.lang.String channelName,
                        Session s)
Create a new InputStream on the given channel name, using the given session.

Parameters:
channelName - The name of the channel to listen on
s - The session to be used.

MundoInputStream

public MundoInputStream(java.lang.String channelName)
Create a new InputStream on the specified channel name. A new session is created, using a dummy service.

Parameters:
channelName - The channel's name to listen on
